thread.section_title: Kezie.co.uk- http://www.kezie.co.uk/ Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of keziefoods.co.uk
thread.title: Julian

author: Julian
title: Julian
text:
Fancied a dinner party with a twist so ordered some crocodile tail steaks.
Arrived within 36 hours still frozen (as expected and described) so defrosted as per instructions.
So far, so good was unsure what to expect, to be honest, but had been browsing how to cook it online (I honestly can't remember which version I went for, but Kezie had suggestions too).
Nice creamy white flesh in 2 x 250g packs.
Opted for safety and went with lightly pan fried in butter and olive oil, with some garlic too. Served it with roast sweet potato, green beans and a medley of roasted veg (carrot, fresh beetroot, cherry Tom's, etc).
Guest 1 absolutely loved it
Guest 2 liked it lots, once she got over what it was.
Wife loved it.
Me Sorry Kezie.... I'd eat it again, but not my thing. That's a personal choice, much like the fact my wife doesn't like pork.
6 year old daughter (next day) loved it.
I'll need to order it again, as my neighbours want to try it, so I will, and I'll eat it.
How does it taste? Agree with the chicken comparison, therefore it easily goes with garlicky butter, and probably loads of other stuff.
Texture? Coarser than chicken, but ours was still tender I'm a fantastic chef (lol joking.... I'm just about competent)
Overall verdict if you have the gumption to order it, you'll eat it. It may not be your thing, but my guests liked it, so you should try it.
Fantastically easy to order, and really fast. Go on you know you should try it bloody he'll I sound like an advert now I'm not so I'll shut up piece said.
Thank you Kezie for a nice twist on our dinner party.
Julian
